Posts.Content: Mar 4, 2017 10:58AM Hamhock wrote: Hi Kim I know how you feel. I was diagnosed just 4 days before my 45th birthday with IDC. I know you feel that your world is coming to an end but its not. You get up everyday and thank God for waking you up every morning no matter how bad it may seem. If you've ever heard of the serenity pray you need to keep it with you and read it everyday. You will make it just stay strong.
